Feedback

We value your feedback and would like to know what you think of the Help Centre. Completing the feedback form below will allow us to make improvements.

If you have an urgent study issue please go to Your OU contacts.

Tell us what you think

What did you want to find out from this website?
Was the information you found easy to understand?
Did you find the information quickly?
Do you need to contact us directly because your query was not answered on the website?
Are you considering studying with us?
Please tell us what you did and didn't like about the site, including any features you used. Suggestions for improvement are also welcome. If you are happy for us to contact you in relation to your feedback then please supply your name, email address and PI. This can help us when resolving issues and any extra information would be much appreciated.

Still need help?

We're trying to make it easier for you to find answers online but we understand that sometimes you just need to talk to someone. Contact us here.

Report a bug

Want to report an issue that you have found in the Help Centre?
